name: GloDer RSS
author: Andrew Frazier

sections.description: This plugin adds a sidebar widget to display links to the site’s RSS feeds, similar to the “Meta” widget but without the login or WordPress links.
sections.installation:
1: Upload gloder-rss.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2: Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What if don’t I want RSS links in my sidebar?

Deactivate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

The content of the plugin file appears where the name should be on the plugin page.

The quick workaround, while a fix is underway, is to hit the edit link then hit the update button.
sections.changelog:
1.0

The first version of the plugin.

1.1

Added the ability to specify the title of the widget

short_description: A plugin to add a sidebar widget for RSS feeds of the current site.
description: This plugin adds a sidebar widget to display links to the site’s RSS feeds, similar to the “Meta” widget but without the login or WordPress links.
